Name: Turf Club (1895, George Kappeler)
Ingredients: 5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
10 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Reminiscent of a Martini but sans vermouth, sweetened with dash of sugar and balanced by heavy use of bitters.
History: Adapted from a recipe in George J. Kappeler's 1895 book, Modern American Drinks .
Nutrition: One serving of Turf Club (1895, George Kappeler) contains 143 calories
